<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Dwarven Weapon Expertise](/Feats.aspx?ID=11) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Dwarf" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=54" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 37 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Dwarven Weapon Familiarity](/Feats.aspx?ID=2)

</column>

---

Your dwarven affinity blends with your training, granting you great skill with dwarven weapons. Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in certain weapons, you also gain that proficiency for [battle axes](/Weapons.aspx?ID=16), [picks](/Weapons.aspx?ID=34), [warhammers](/Weapons.aspx?ID=47), and all [dwarven](/Traits.aspx?ID=54) weapons in which you are trained.
name: Dwarven Weapon Expertise
